anomalies.message: [ESCALATE] The money order shows multiple red flags—missing written amount and elevated Random Forest (74.2%) and XGBoost (73.1%) scores—against a brand‐new customer profile with no track record.

raw_text:
WESTERN WESTERN UNION®
UNION
MONEY ORDER
PAY TO: JANE SMITH
987557821
AMOUNT:
$750.00
DATE: OCTOBER 26, 2023
SEVEN HUNDRED FISTY AND 00//100 DOLLARS
FROM: JOHN DOE
123 OAK ST, ANYTOWN, CA 91234
9875647821
AGENT AUTHORIZED SIGNATURE

ai_analysis.summary: The money order shows multiple red flags—missing written amount and elevated Random Forest (74.2%) and XGBoost (73.1%) scores—against a brand‐new customer profile with no track record.
reasoning: Customer is brand new with no ID or transaction history, raising baseline risk (training data shows new customers are 30% more likely to be involved in fraud).
Amount (Written) is unknown, creating an amount‐mismatch red flag (45% of fraud cases involve numeric vs. written amount discrepancies).
Random Forest and XGBoost both score above 70%, indicating strong model signals of potential manipulation; the reported 0.0% ensemble score is likely a data error.
No similar historical cases to benchmark, so manual review is critical.
Signature field is present, so no mandatory reject on signature grounds.
actionable_recommendations: Contact Western Union to validate serial number 9875647821 and confirm issued amount.
Request and inspect valid ID from John Doe (purchaser) and Jane Smith (payee).
Physically compare the numeric and written amounts on the original document.
